questions.question: Wich statement is true about microservices?
questions.answer_A: They focus on technical integration issues and the level of the implemented services are often fine-grained technical APIs
questions.answer_B: They support the packaging of the applications in a monolithic fashion
questions.answer_C: They implement clear business capabilities through coarse-grained business APIS
questions.answer_D: They are a service built and delivered without automation of testing and deployment and operations

comments.comment: B - Microserviços são o oposto de aplicações monolíticas. /n C - O ideal é decompor em fine-grained services, mas pode se iniciar com coarse-grained. Não está correto. /n D - Resposta totalmente sem sentido
